attributes.action: Don't let people of working age with dementia go for ATOS  WCA's
attributes.additional_details: People of any age can be afflicted with dementia and they could live well into their seventies and beyond.  People suffering from dementia should not be forced to go for ATOS Work Capability Assessments.  They would not know what is happening and the families of dementia sufferers do not need the added worry of benefits being cut or stopped altogether.
